GSD.product_version: versions from v4.9 to before v5.10.163
GSD.description:
net: sched: fix memory leak in tcindex_set_parms

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.163 by commit b314f6c3512108d7a656c5caf07c82d1bbbdc0f1, it was introduced in version v4.9 by commit b9a24bb76bf611a5268ceffe04219e6ad264559b. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: sched: fix memory leak in tcindex_set_parms
